text: Nkyɛnkyɛn adan a ɛwowɔ soro no mu trɛ sene deɛ ɛwowɔ aseɛ. Asan mmiɛnsa a atwa asɔredan no ho ahyia no, deɛ ɛwɔ ɔsoro biara trɛ sene deɛ ɛwɔ nʼase, ɛno enti nkyɛnkyɛn adan a ɛwowɔ soro mu trɛ sene deɛ ɛwowɔ nʼase. Atwedeɛ bi firi asan a ɛwɔ fam pa ara no so foro tra mfimfini asan no kɔ asan a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa so.
